name: 3DK Fantasy Puzzles
description:
Fantasy Puzzles, by 3DK Render Studio, is a sliding block puzzle game.

The game has several puzzles that must be completed in a certain time to be able to move on to the next one.

Multilingual: English, Spanish

All the illustrations have been created by 3DK Render Studio and are available in our Patreon page.

Thank you very much for choosing our game.
